title: Ossuary
subtitle: Dark Places
body: Investigate the dark heart of Roselake, where witch hunts hide older horrors. Unravel superstition and blood-bound pacts.

title: Mutant
subtitle: Background + Feats
body: Are you willing to let your body twist and contort grotesquely forever in exchange for new powers?

title: Crucifixion
subtitle: Horrifying Magic
body: Seasonal one-shots drenched in black humor and bone dust. Gather your players around the last light of winter.
